title: Pfizer, Moderna researching rare side effect linked to COVID vaccines
author: KATIE CAVINESS; The National Desk
description: With a triple-threat virus sweeping across the country, pharmaceutical companies have launched their own clinical trials on COVID vaccines in young adults and t
